summary.span: 表示存取控制項目 (ACE) 的抽象概念，其定義管道的稽核規則。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an audit rule for a pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 稽核規則會決定何時以及如何記錄系統物件上執行的動作。Audit rules determine when and how actions performed on system objects are logged. 類別代表基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，指定使用者帳戶，以提供 （讀取、 寫入和等等），存取類型的抽象概念，以及是否要進行稽核。The class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to perform auditing. 這個類別會指定如何繼承自和傳播到物件稽核規則。This class can specify how audit rules are inherited from and propagated to objects. 若要讓執行 Windows NT 或更新版本的作業系統的電腦上的稽核檔案，必須啟用稽核存取安全性原則。根據預設，此原則設定為**沒有稽核**。To allow file auditing on computers that are running Windows NT or later operating systems, the Audit Access Security policy must be enabled; by default, this policy is set to **No Auditing**. 若要啟用稽核存取安全性原則，請執行下列步驟：To enable the Audit Access Security policy, perform the following steps: 1. 按一下**啟動**按鈕，然後指向**所有程式**。Click the **Start** button and then point to **All Programs**. 指向**系統管理工具**，然後按一下 **本機安全性原則**。Point to **Administrative Tools** and then click **Local Security Policy**. 2. 在 [本機安全性設定] 視窗中，展開 [本機原則] 資料夾，以滑鼠左鍵按一下 [稽核原則] 資料夾。In the Local Security Settings window, expand the Local Policies folder and left-click the Audit Policy folder. 3. 按兩下**稽核物件存取**以顯示 本機安全性設定 視窗的右窗格中的項目**稽核物件存取屬性** 對話方塊。Double-click the **Audit object access** entry in the right pane of the Local Security Settings window to display the **Audit object access Properties** dialog box. 4. 選取**成功**或**失敗**方塊，以記錄成功或失敗。Select the **Success** or **Failure** boxes to log successes or failures. 請注意使用者帳戶的稽核規則，需要有對應的存取規則，對相同的使用者帳戶。Note that an audit rule for a user account requires a corresponding access rule for the same user account. 使用類別來建立新的稽核規則。Use the class to create a new audit rule. 您可以保存此規則使用類別。You can persist this rule using the class.
